review: It's overall very impressive, but the photo feature collapses my folders so that I no longer have the hierarchical structure of my directories and it also is not sorted.  It makes it hard to find my photos.  I have over 13,000 in 390 directories and sub-directories.  Also, it currently does not allow you to stream Amazon Cloud Player.  While Pandora is nice, I want to listen to *my* music.I decided to keep my Prime trial because its now easy to select and organize movies into watchlists.  Before with my smart tv, trying to find movies was really painful.
author: Warlock

review: The Fire TV is awesome! We bought this mainly because it had an app available for Plex and it works incredibly well with Plex. It will play our 1:1 BluRay rips without any trouble and no need for the server to transcode anything. The other apps work well too but some aren't quite as nicely animated as on other platforms, for example, the Netflix app works well but doesn't have any of the smooth animations that happen on the Xbox or Playstation  Netflix apps.The other particularly awesome feature of this box are the dual wifi antennas. Our bedroom tv is a wifi dead spot in our house and no other box is able to get a signal, Fire TV connected without trouble and has had a strong signal ever since.We also love the remote, but the voice search is really only useful for Prime subscribers.
author: BassManMike

review: Yet another tiny box who wants to take over your TV room entertainment. Thank goodness these boxes are small or it would be a crowded media closet.Setup for FireTV was very easy, I was flipping through the interface in minutes. It has it's fair share of content compared to its competitors but with the addition of gaming. I purchased the game pad as well and that connected flawlessly. The game content is nothing to boast about and I hope over time it will improve, otherwise XBOX and PS4 will still own that world and opens the door for the other boxes to improve. At least get a 4 star game like an Angry Birds!The UI could use some work, it seems they didn't focus much on style, already feels antiquated (hence the 4 stars) although it is functional.Overall I'm happy with FireTV and would recommend to friends, but I wouldn't crown it King of the Streaming Media boxes just yet.
author: A. C. Eberhardt "Aceface3"
